snippet: The $284 million investment in Piramal Realty is the private equity firm’s fifth investment in India in less than a year.
abstract: DealBook Online; Warburg Pincus will invest roughly $284 million in Indian real estate developer Piramal Realty; marks private equity firm's fifth investment in India in less than year.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The $284 million investment in Piramal Realty is the private equity firm’s fifth investment in India in less than a year.

headline.main: Warburg Pincus to Take Stake in Indian Developer
